mapper.insert: insert into core_data.products (id, code, name, product_available, unit_price, quantity_per_unit, sizes, color, unit_weight, unit_in_stock, unit_on_order, discount_available, discount, ranking, note, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, supplier_id, category_id, picture ) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{productAvailable}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{quantityPerUnit}, #{sizes}, #{color}, #{unitWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unitInStock,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitOnOrder}, #{discountAvailable}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ranking}, #{note}, #{isActive}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdTimestamp}, #{updatedTimestamp}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId}, #{picture} )
mapper.update: update core_data.products set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, product_available = #{productAvailable}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, quantity_per_unit = #{quantityPerUnit}, sizes = #{sizes}, color = #{color}, unit_weight = #{unitWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, unit_in_stock = #{unitInStock,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit_on_order = #{unitOnOrder}, discount_available = #{discountAvailable}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ranking = #{ranking}, note = #{note}, is_active = #{isActive}, created_by = #{createdBy}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, category_id = #{categoryId}, picture = #{picture} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, product_available, unit_price, quantity_per_unit, sizes, color, unit_weight, unit_in_stock, unit_on_order, discount_available, discount, ranking, note, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, supplier_id, category_id, picture from core_data.products where id = #{id}

select id, code, name, product_available, unit_price, quantity_per_unit, sizes, color, unit_weight, unit_in_stock, unit_on_order, discount_available, discount, ranking, note, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, supplier_id, category_id, picture from core_data.products
